item.source: How can i put in codes and stuff into my new server?

item.title: How can i put in codes and stuff into my new server?
item.dc:creator: @P3NGU1N1 P3NGU1N!!!
item.description:
@P3NGU1N1 wrote:

First off you need to know where to add commands. Second of all there are all types of commands suchs as teleports, items, and experience.

Basic teleporting command: (Edit where is says COMMANDNAMEHERE and X-Coords and Y-Coords)

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAMEHERE")) if(absY >= 3672) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness."); } else { teleportToX = X-Coords; teleportToY = Y-Coords;
That is the basic way to make a teleporting one

Basic Items command: (edit where is says COMMANDNAMEHERE, 1-3[1 = mods+ only, 2=staff+ only, and 3=admins+ only], item ID, amount, and YOURMESSAGEHERE)

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAMEHERE") && playerRights >= 1-3) { addItem(item ID, amount); addItem(item ID, amount); addItem(item ID, amount); addItem(item ID, amount); addItem(item ID, amount); addItem(item ID, amount); addItem(item ID, amount); addItem(item ID, amount); addItem(item ID, amount); sendMessage("YOURMESSAGEHERE"); }

Basic Stat Raiser Command: (edit where is says COMMANDNAMEHERE and MESSAGEHERE)

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAMEHERE") && playerRights >= 2){   addSkillXP(14000000, 0);    addSkillXP(14000000, 1);    addSkillXP(14000000, 2);    addSkillXP(14000000, 3);    addSkillXP(14000000, 4);    addSkillXP(14000000, 5);    addSkillXP(14000000, 6);    addSkillXP(14000000, 7);    addSkillXP(14000000, 8);    addSkillXP(14000000, 9);    addSkillXP(14000000, 10);    addSkillXP(14000000, 11);   addSkillXP(14000000, 12);    addSkillXP(14000000, 13);    addSkillXP(14000000, 14);    addSkillXP(14000000, 15);    addSkillXP(14000000, 16);    addSkillXP(14000000, 17);    addSkillXP(14000000, 18);    addSkillXP(14000000, 19);    addSkillXP(14000000, 20);    addSkillXP(14000000, 21);    addSkillXP(14000000, 22);   addSkillXP(14000000, 23);    addSkillXP(14000000, 24);   sendMessage("MESSAGEHERE"); }

Good Luck.

Read full topic
